review: WoW .... works so good we bought a second one
author: sandy carpenter

review: Easy to set up, just wish it worked with more ipad apps.  You can't mirror everything you see on the ipad.  We have a Roku 3 on another TV and I prefer it to the Chromecast because we mainly use it for Netflix and Hulu and it works very well for those.  If you are using a lot of Android devices, I would think the Chromecast would be better.
author: Nick Madsen

review: Works as expected. Super simple getting one for my living room tv as well. Would love if there was support for other browsers besides google chrome.
author: Arti

review: We own several of these and have given them as gifts.  The thing works like it is supposed to and it's easy to use!
author: Cheree Carlson

review: Works great - wish it had more apps to support it
author: Edward A.

review: 5 stars period.. i have 2o f these now one in living room and the bed room
